title: need help ASAP plz
body:
hey guys, 

this past 2 months i have the bug of "possible data connexion" almost everyday, and it caused me so many points and low priority bans, because after the game starts loading it crashes or sometimes after 2 seconds in game, pllllzz is there anything i can do to fix this

PS: its not because of the current patch because it happened to me in the past one and the one before.

replies.body:
Sounds like your network might be having a hard time communicating with our servers for some reason. Sometimes your internet can let you browse the web, play other online games, but if it can't get a stable connection to our servers you can still get disconnected. 

Take some time to go through the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and we should be able to get you back on the Rift!

thank you so much for replying, as i am speaking i got the problem again, and this is my third afk ban (5 matchs low priority, 20 minutes) :( in 48 hours, i realy dont know what to do, and i am sure its not a connection problem, because i was just playing a game normaly, when i finished i launched another game and it crashed after champ select and it wont reconnect than when i close the client and restart it i got the the message "sorry, we're detected some possible data corruption in you instalation, would you like to repair the affected files? when i click OK it starts scaning and downloading some files, each time it does that.

here you find attached the URL to see the message and the scaning

https://ibb.co/eCuibF
https://ibb.co/c1ZGwF


thank you so much again, i hope you know how to fix this, i am seriously thinking of stopping playing this game.

Ahaaaaa! It seems like that message you were getting before might have been a corruption message and not a connection error. Since this is the case, your best bet would be to let the client fully repair itself instead of stopping it midway. Once you let it finish, you should then have a stable game installation and should be able to play again. 

I don't want you to get any more low priority queues, so let's be sure to test these changes in custom games to be sure everything is in order before trying pvp matches again!

yes bro, everytime time i let it finish the repair and still get the bug, and everytime i test it on a custom game, and lets say i play  2 games or 3 normaly, and than i still get the bug, without even restarting the client, sometimes it happen in the middel of the game.
okay, ty so much bro, u da best. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
